text:
Amazing luncheon!

We had a salad, a calamari, pesto salad, carbonara and a meat pizza. The food service came very promptly and it smelled really good.

Food was delicious and different from our usual Italian go to restaurant further down Dunearn Road.

Nice!

I had an amazing dining experience at Lino! The food was absolutely fantastic. The seafood pasta was perfectly cooked, with juicy prawns and scallops that were fresh and flavorful. The seasoning was spot on, and the pasta had just the right texture.

The steak with a sunny-side-up egg was another highlight—tender, juicy, and cooked to perfection. The sauce added a delicious depth of flavor, and the crispy fries and fresh greens complemented the dish wonderfully.

The ambiance was cozy and inviting, and the service was excellent. The staff was attentive and friendly, making the experience even better.

Highly recommend Lino for anyone looking for great food and a lovely atmosphere. I’ll definitely be coming back!

Really good service and food. Will return again. Kid friendly. Forgot to get the name of the host. Tiramisu, Panama cotta and cheesecake was good!

We had a lovely birthday song tribute. Made our lunch a memorable one indeed

Today, my friends and I visited Lino@Binjai for a Christmas and New Year gathering, and it turned out to be a fantastic choice! This was our first time at the restaurant, and we were impressed.

The food was exceptional. A standout recommendation is the Burrata Pizza—a must-try! It features a thin crust perfectly layered with fresh tomato paste and creamy burrata cheese. Absolutely delicious! Another highlight was the Iberian Pork, suggested by the attentive staff member ZQ, which was cooked to perfection. We also enjoyed the seafood spaghetti, which was rich in flavor and perfectly balanced. The chicken wings, garlic bread, and truffle fries were all excellent additions to our meal.

A special shoutout to ZQ, whose excellent service made our meal even more enjoyable. This restaurant is definitely worth visiting. We’ll be back!

Chance upon this restaurant, and was pleasantly surprised! Awesome food which my family and I really enjoyed, especially the clams which the server has recommended!

Stomach didn't have any spare capacity for the evening, so didn't get to try the desserts - next time! ;)
